document.full_text: greece appears to have agreed a tax cut with its international lenders, aimed at forging a broad consensus for more austerity to avoid a debt default, but the opposition said on tuesday this would still not win its support.
document.title: greece moves on austerity deal, opposition wants more
lines_and_colors: greece appears to have agreed a tax cut with its international lenders, aimed at forging a broad consensus for more austerity to avoid a debt default, but the opposition said on tuesday this would still not win its support.
